wyakulathwaye manasika pidanaya adu kirima mema hakiyawan adu karayi obe sithuwili, nishedhaniyathwaya ha lingika manahkalpitha palanaya kirimata igena ganna niwase sanwidhanathmaka hakiyawan - pirisidu kirima saha sappu yame purudu; wadagath liyakiyawili, bilpath saha ladupath anupiliwelin pawathwa ganima rakiyawak sandaha illum karana aakaraya saha sammukha sakachcha sandaha hondin sudanam wiya yuthu ya mulya hakiyawan - ayawaya igenima ha haki nam, surakinna honda sanniwedanayak thulin an aya samaga sambandha wimata jiwitha kusalatha aakramanashili, udasina aakramanashili ho udasina ayurin wenaswana awasthawanhidi thrupthimath bawa igena ganima salakilimath ha parawarthaka shrawana hakiyawa gatum kalamanakarana hakiyawan usawi kusalatha nidasunak lesa anthar-pawul pawul sabandathawayak saukhya sampanna samajagatha kirima paripurna manushyayan lesa api wardhanaya kara, pulul kirima saha godananga ganima sandaha jiwana kusalatha wardhanaya kirima abhyanthara hangim prakasha kirimata nirmanashili wima - gayanaya kirima, narthanaya kirima, upakaranaya, natya, warna liwima, katha liyanna winoda wima, krida kirima, hina, wihiluwak kiyanna swechcha sewaya, an ayata upakara kirima mema web pituwata pamanak riward padaname 3-piyawara nawatha sakas kirime aakruthiye sarala salasmak laba di atha.

19 ewita ohu me thanaththa samanga aapasu gos ohuge gedara kama ka wathura biwe ya. 20 owun mese hindina kala ee thanaththa aapasu kandawagena aa diwasiwaraya wetha samindanan wahansege paniwudaya pamunune ya. 21 judahi sita pamini dewiyan wahanseta kapa wu ee manushyayata ohu katha kota, ”samindanan wahanse mese wadarana seka: ‘numbaa samindanan wahansege paniwudayata akikaru wi, numbae dewi samindanan wahanse numbaata ana kala aagnyawa raksha nokota, 22 hari awuth, yam sthanayaka di kama kanna wath, wathura bonna wath epa yayi numbaata wadala sek da, ee sthanayehi di numbaa kama ka, wathura biwu nisa, numbae malakanda numbae piyawarunge sohon geta nopaminenne ya’ ”yi ki ya.
